DESCRIPTION: If you have three channelled invokable orbs, gain a new spell based on which orbs you have channelled.
Consumed cards are permanently removed from your deck.
Using a campfire action, can be combined with a second card to produce a powerful new card.  Cannot be upgraded.
Can be crafted by combining two cards using a campfire action.  Gains the effect of both cards and an extra effect.
Powerful card made by combining two #yCraftable cards. Cannot be upgraded.
Ally spells are powerful but don't benefit from your buffs.
Prevents any buffs/debuffs (but not attacks) from this enemy this turn.
Your next basic Attack card is played multiple times.
Card can be played on an enemy or yourself.
Gain [E] at the start of each turn.
The next time you are attacked reflect the damage back to the attacker.
Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
